00419     static void pushTable( lua_State* impl, const LuaTable* v );
00420 
00421     /* 
00422      * Returns C++ this pointer from table in stack at specified position.
00423      * C++ this pointer is set to index [0] of the table.
00424      * If [0] is not this pointer, then the table has no C++ counterpart.
00425      * Used by implementation.
00426      * @exception LuaException
00427      */
00428     static LuaTable* getThisPtr( lua_State* impl, int index );
00429 
00430     /*
00431      * Used by the implementation of Lua call dispatch system.
00432      */
00433     static void getDispatchData( lua_State* impl, LuaState** luastate, LuaFunctor* lf );
00434

00438         const char* buffer;
00439         int size;
00440     };
00441 
00442     struct LoadFile
00443     {
00444         NS(io,InputStream)* in;
00445         int size;
00446         char buf[2048];
00447     };
00448 
00449     lua_State*          m_impl;
00450     LuaTable            m_globals;

00452     void                handleLoadResult( int err, const NS(lang,String)& name, LuaTable* env );

00454     static const char*  loadFile( lua_State* impl, void* data, size_t* size );
00455     static int          handleError( lua_State* impl );
